hicpp-use-equals-delete.description:
Description

This check is an alias for
modernize-use-equals-delete
.
Implements
rule 12.5.1
to explicitly default or delete special member functions.
hicpp-use-equals-delete.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
